{{ cards.firstName }}

  • {{ cards.nationality }}
  • {{ cards.position }}
  • {{ cards.club }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Card } from 'src/app/models/card'; import { FutApiService } from 'src/app/service/fut-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fut-list', templateUrl: './fut-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fut-list.component.scss'] }) export class FutListComponent implements OnInit{ private setCards: Card[] = []; public cards: Card[] = []; constructor(private futApiService: FutApiService){ } ngOnInit() { this.futApiService.getCards().subscribe(res => { this.setCards = res; this.cards = this.setCards; }); } public getSearch(value: string){ const filter = this.setCards.filter( (res: Card) =>{ return !res.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(value.toLowerCase()); }); this.cards = filter; } }
